snippet.title: Vampire Survivors: Operation Guns - Official Contra & PS Announce Trailer | Triple-I Initiative
snippet.description:
Watch the latest trailer for Vampire Survivors to see what to expect wtih the Operation Guns DLC featuring Contra, ahead of its release on Xbox, PC, and Nintendo Switch on May 9, 2024. The trailer also reveals that Vampire Survivors is coming to PS4 (PlayStation 4) and PS5 (PlayStation 5) in summer 2024. 

Vampire Survivors is a time survival game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements. Hell is empty, the devils are here, and there's no place to run or hide. All you can do is survive as long as you can until death inevitably puts an end to your struggles. Gather gold in each run to buy upgrades and help the next survivor. The supernatural indie phenomenon that lets you be the bullet hell!
